data.eml:eml: Three new species of squat lobsters of the genus Fennerogalathea Baba, 1988 (Decapoda: Galatheidae) from the Pacific Ocean

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Rodriguez-Flores, Paula C., Machordom, Annie, Macpherson, Enrique (2017): Three new species of squat lobsters of the genus Fennerogalathea Baba, 1988 (Decapoda: Galatheidae) from the Pacific Ocean. Zootaxa 4276 (1), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4276.1.2
